snippet: A host of dignitaries, relatives and friends eulogized Frank R. Lautenberg, a five-term United States senator, at a funeral service Wednesday in Manhattan.
abstract: Host of dignitaries, relatives and friends eulogize five-term United States Senator Frank R Lautenberg at funeral service in Manhattan; they speak of Lautenberg's character, shaped by his childhood in Paterson, NJ, and influencing his battles as lawmaker on issues like public health, gun control, immigration and environmental issues.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HALBFINGER and MARC SANTORA

lead_paragraph: A host of dignitaries, relatives and friends eulogized Frank R. Lautenberg, a five-term United States senator, at a funeral service Wednesday in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Political Leaders Remember Lautenberg as a Senator Who Loved the Fight
headline.main: Political Leaders Honor Lautenberg as a Senator Who Loved the Fight
headline.print_headline: Political Leaders Honor Lautenberg as a Senator Who Loved the Fight
